00019 #include "kernel_pixelgroups.h"
00020 #include "kernel_error.h"
00021 #include <stdlib.h>
00022 #include <memory.h>
00023 #include <string.h>

00025 #ifdef _IPL98_USING_CPP
00026 namespace ipl{ /* use namespace if C++ */
00027 extern "C" { /* prevent name mangling for C functions */
00028 #endif
00029 
00030 /************************************************/
00031 /********        Private functions       ********/
00032 /************************************************/
00033 
00034 /* This is a private function */
00035 void k_ReAllocGroups(TPixelGroups* pPixelGroups,unsigned int NewSize);
00036 
00037 /************************************************/
00038 /********        Public functions        ********/
00039 /************************************************/
00040 
00041 void k_InitGroups(TPixelGroups* pPixelGroups)
00042 {
00043         pPixelGroups->NumberOfGroups=0;
00044         pPixelGroups->AllocatedGroups=0; /* internal use */
00045         pPixelGroups->pGroups=NULL;
00046 }
00047 
00048 /*      Deletes all allocated memory for PixelGroup */
00049 void k_EmptyGroups(TPixelGroups* pPixelGroups)
00050 {
00051         unsigned int i;
00052         if (pPixelGroups->pGroups!=NULL)
00053         {
00054                 for(i=0;i<pPixelGroups->NumberOfGroups; i++)
00055                 {
00056                         k_EmptyGroup(&(pPixelGroups->pGroups[i]));
00057                 }
00058                 free(pPixelGroups->pGroups);
00059         }
00060         k_InitGroups(pPixelGroups);
00061 }
00062 
00063 void k_AllocGroups(TPixelGroups* pPixelGroups,unsigned int InitialSize)
00064 {
00065         unsigned int i;
00066         k_EmptyGroups(pPixelGroups);
00067         if (InitialSize==0)
00068                 InitialSize=1; /* minimum one allocated TPixelGroup */
00069         pPixelGroups->pGroups=(TPixelGroup*)malloc(InitialSize*sizeof(TPixelGroup));
00070         for(i=0;i<InitialSize;i++)
00071                 k_InitGroup(&(pPixelGroups->pGroups[i]));
00072 
00073         pPixelGroups->NumberOfGroups=0; /* just in case! */
00074         pPixelGroups->AllocatedGroups=InitialSize; /* internal use */
00075 }
00076 
00077 void k_AddGroupToGroups(const TPixelGroup* pPixelGroup, TPixelGroups* pPixelGroups)
00078 {
00079         const TPixelGroup* pGrp=pPixelGroup; /* short hand notation */
00080         TPixelGroups* pGrps=pPixelGroups; /* short hand notation */
00081         if (pGrps->NumberOfGroups==pGrps->AllocatedGroups)
00082         {
00083                 /* allocate 20 new TPixelGroup structures in array */
00084                 k_ReAllocGroups(pGrps,20+pGrps->AllocatedGroups);
00085         }
00086         /* Insert TPixelGroup structure */
00087         pGrps->pGroups[pGrps->NumberOfGroups] = *pPixelGroup;
00088         if (pGrp->pPos!=NULL)
00089         {
00090                 /* allocate new memory for the pPos in new TPixelGroup and copy the position values */
00091                 (pGrps->pGroups[pGrps->NumberOfGroups]).pPos = (T2DInt*)malloc((pGrp->NumberOfPixels*sizeof(T2DInt)));
00092                 memcpy((pGrps->pGroups[pGrps->NumberOfGroups]).pPos,pGrp->pPos,pGrp->NumberOfPixels*sizeof(T2DInt));
00093         }
00094         if (pGrp->pColor!=NULL)
00095         {
00096                 /* allocate new memory for the pColor in new TPixelGroup and copy color values */
00097                 (pGrps->pGroups[pGrps->NumberOfGroups]).pColor = (UINT32*)malloc((pGrp->NumberOfPixels*sizeof(UINT32)));
00098                 memcpy((pGrps->pGroups[pGrps->NumberOfGroups]).pColor,pGrp->pColor,pGrp->NumberOfPixels*sizeof(UINT32));
00099         }
00100         /* Increment total groups variable */
00101         pPixelGroups->NumberOfGroups++;
00102 }
00103 
00104 bool k_InsertGroupInGroups(const TPixelGroup* pPixelGroup, unsigned int Index,
00105                                                    TPixelGroups* pPixelGroups)
00106 {
00107         TPixelGroup DummyGroup;
00108         if (Index>=pPixelGroups->NumberOfGroups)
00109         {
00110                 TString str;
00111                 k_InitString(&str);
00112                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00113                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_InsertGroupInGroups() Index (%d) is out of range (NumberOfGroups=%d)",
00114                         Index,pPixelGroups->NumberOfGroups);
00115             k_EmptyString(&str);
00116                 return false;
00117         }
00118         k_InitGroup(&DummyGroup);
00119         /* Add a dummy position to the end of position array */
00120         k_AddGroupToGroups(&DummyGroup,pPixelGroups);
00121         /* Move groups */
00122         memmove(&(pPixelGroups->pGroups[Index+1]),&(pPixelGroups->pGroups[Index]),
00123                 sizeof(TPixelGroup)*(pPixelGroups->NumberOfGroups-Index-1));
00124         /* Insert TPixelGroup structure at Index */
00125         pPixelGroups->pGroups[Index] = *pPixelGroup;
00126         if (pPixelGroup->pPos!=NULL)
00127         {
00128                 /* allocate new memory for the pPos in new TPixelGroup and copy the position values */
00129                 (pPixelGroups->pGroups[Index]).pPos = (T2DInt*)malloc((pPixelGroup->NumberOfPixels*sizeof(T2DInt)));
00130                 memcpy((pPixelGroups->pGroups[Index]).pPos,pPixelGroup->pPos,pPixelGroup->NumberOfPixels*sizeof(T2DInt));
00131         }
00132         if (pPixelGroup->pColor!=NULL)
00133         {
00134                 /* allocate new memory for the pColor in new TPixelGroup and copy color values */
00135                 (pPixelGroups->pGroups[Index]).pColor = (UINT32*)malloc((pPixelGroup->NumberOfPixels*sizeof(UINT32)));
00136                 memcpy((pPixelGroups->pGroups[Index]).pColor,pPixelGroup->pColor,pPixelGroup->NumberOfPixels*sizeof(UINT32));
00137         }
00138         /* The total groups variable (pPixelGroups->NumberOfGroups)
00139                 are already updated when inserting the dummygroup above */
00140         return true;
00141 }
00142 
00143 bool k_AddColorsToGroups(const TImage* pSource,TPixelGroups* pPixelGroups)
00144 {
00145         unsigned int i;
00146         if ((pSource==NULL) || (pPixelGroups==NULL))
00147         {
00148                 TString str;
00149                 k_InitString(&str);
00150                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00151                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_AddColorsToGroups() At least one parameter is a NULL pointer");
00152             k_EmptyString(&str);
00153                 return false;
00154         }
00155         for(i=0; i<pPixelGroups->NumberOfGroups; i++)
00156         {
00157                 k_AddColorsToGroup(pSource,&(pPixelGroups->pGroups[i]));
00158         }
00159         return true;
00160 }
00161 
00162 bool k_RemoveGroup(TPixelGroups *pPixelGroups,unsigned int GroupIndex)
00163 {
00164         if (pPixelGroups==NULL)
00165         {
00166                 TString str;
00167                 k_InitString(&str);
00168                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00169                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_RemoveGroup() pPixelGroups parameter is NULL");
00170             k_EmptyString(&str);
00171                 return false;
00172         }
00173         if (GroupIndex>=pPixelGroups->NumberOfGroups)
00174         {
00175                 TString str;
00176                 k_InitString(&str);
00177                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00178                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_RemoveGroup() Blob index out of range");
00179             k_EmptyString(&str);
00180                 return false;
00181         }
00182         if (GroupIndex<pPixelGroups->NumberOfGroups-1)
00183         {
00184                 /* free the memory in the group to be removed */
00185                 k_EmptyGroup(&(pPixelGroups->pGroups[GroupIndex]));
00186                 /*s0=pPixelGroups->NumberOfGroups-1;*/
00187                 pPixelGroups->pGroups[GroupIndex]=pPixelGroups->pGroups[pPixelGroups->NumberOfGroups-1];
00188         }
00189         else
00190         {
00191                 /* only need to free the memory in the group to be removed */
00192                 k_EmptyGroup(&(pPixelGroups->pGroups[GroupIndex]));
00193         }
00194         pPixelGroups->NumberOfGroups--;
00195         return true;
00196 }
00197 
00198 bool k_RemoveGroupSlow(TPixelGroups *pPixelGroups,unsigned int GroupIndex)
00199 {
00200         if (GroupIndex>=pPixelGroups->NumberOfGroups)
00201         {
00202                 TString str;
00203                 k_InitString(&str);
00204                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00205                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_RemoveGroupSlow() Index (%d) is out of range (NumberOfGroups=%d)",
00206                         GroupIndex,pPixelGroups->NumberOfGroups);
00207             k_EmptyString(&str);
00208                 return false;
00209         }
00210         /* Move groups */
00211         memmove(&(pPixelGroups->pGroups[GroupIndex]),&(pPixelGroups->pGroups[GroupIndex+1]),
00212                 sizeof(TPixelGroup)*(pPixelGroups->NumberOfGroups-GroupIndex-1));
00213         /* Decrement total groups variable */
00214         pPixelGroups->NumberOfGroups--;
00215         return true;
00216 }
00217 
00218 bool k_GetGroupWithPos(const TPixelGroups* pPixelGroups, unsigned int* pGroupIndex,
00219                                            T2DInt Pos,unsigned int* pPosIndex)
00220 {
00221         unsigned int i;
00222         unsigned TempIndex;
00223         if (pPixelGroups==NULL)
00224         {
00225                 TString str;
00226                 k_InitString(&str);
00227                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00228                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_GetGroupWithPos() pPixelGroup parameter is NULL");
00229             k_EmptyString(&str);
00230                 return false;
00231         }
00232         for (i=0;i<pPixelGroups->NumberOfGroups;i++)
00233         {
00234                 if (k_PosInGroup(&(pPixelGroups->pGroups[i]),Pos,&TempIndex))
00235                 {
00236                         *pGroupIndex = i;
00237                         if (pPosIndex!=NULL)
00238                                 *pPosIndex=TempIndex;
00239                         return true;
00240                 }
00241         }
00242         /* if the loope didn't return, the given position is not in any of the groups */
00243         return false;
00244 }
00245 
00246 void k_PrintGroupsInfo(const TPixelGroups* pPixelGroups)
00247 {
00248         printf("**************** PixelGroups info ********************\n");
00249         printf(" Number of groups inserted: %d  TPixelGroup structures allocated: %d\n",
00250                 pPixelGroups->NumberOfGroups,pPixelGroups->AllocatedGroups);
00251 }
00252 
00253 /************************************************/
00254 /********        Private functions       ********/
00255 /************************************************/
00256 
00257 void k_ReAllocGroups(TPixelGroups* pPixelGroups,unsigned int NewSize)
00258 {
00259         unsigned int i;
00260         if ((pPixelGroups->pGroups=(TPixelGroup*)realloc(pPixelGroups->pGroups,NewSize*sizeof(TPixelGroup)))!=NULL)
00261         {
00262                 for(i=pPixelGroups->AllocatedGroups; i<NewSize; i++)
00263                         k_InitGroup(&(pPixelGroups->pGroups[i]));
00264 
00265                 pPixelGroups->AllocatedGroups=NewSize; /* internal use */
00266         }
00267         else
00268         {
00269                 TString str;
00270                 k_InitString(&str);
00271                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00272                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_ReAllocGroups() Realloc failed");
00273             k_EmptyString(&str);
00274         }
00275 }
